20101228020136.000|20101228020138.000|CC1|COAST, A BRUTAL SNOWSTORM IS    
20101228020138.000|20101228020139.000|CC1|POUNDING PARTS OF THE NORTHEAST.
20101228020139.000|20101228020141.000|CC1|THOUSAND OF FLIGHTS HAVE BEEN

20101228020211.000|20101228020212.000|CC1|NORTH CAROLINA ARE MAKING

20101228020632.000|20101228020634.000|CC1|-- WRENCHING PLEA FOR LIFE.     
20101228020634.000|20101228020639.000|CC1|>> WE WANT JUSTICE.             
20101228020639.000|20101228020641.000|CC1|TOOK AN INNOCENT LIFE.          
20101228020641.000|20101228020643.000|CC1|>> Reporter: 25-YEAR-OLD JAMES  
20101228020643.000|20101228020643.000|CC1|WAS GUNNED DOWN CHRISTMAS NIGHT 
20101228020643.000|20101228020646.000|CC1|ON HER WAY TO VISIT A FRIEND IN 
20101228020646.000|20101228020647.000|CC1|SOUTH L.A.                      
20101228020647.000|20101228020649.000|CC1|JAMES WAS GETTING OUT OF HER    
20101228020649.000|20101228020653.000|CC1|CAR ALONG 85th STREET NEAR      
20101228020653.000|20101228020654.000|CC1|WESTERN ALONG 8:30.             
20101228020654.000|20101228020657.000|CC1|TWO SUSPECTS PULLED UP IN A     
20101228020657.000|20101228020659.000|CC1|DARK VEHICLE AND OPENED FIRE.   
20101228020659.000|20101228020700.000|CC1|VIOLENCE ERUPTING AS HER        
20101228020700.000|20101228020702.000|CC1|3-YEAR-OLD DAUGHTER SAT IN THE  
20101228020702.000|20101228020703.000|CC1|BACK SEAT OF THEIR CAR.         
20101228020703.000|20101228020705.000|CC1|POLICE SAY JAMES WAS AN
